Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is directly preceded by 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that occur after 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' relative to the frequency of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears exactly once
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Number of variants in which 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs immediately before the end of the process
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' executions that are part of accepted manuscript pathways (i.e., preceded by 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' compared to the frequency of 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that follow a revision cycle (i.e., occur after any 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of total process duration attributable to waiting at 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' across all variants containing it
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in variants that originate from 'SW-EIC Accept' versus those from 'RW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences to the total number of 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' events
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' events per month to assess temporal distribution
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
